amendment.description: An amendment numbered 106 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit funds to be used for the shooting of cattle in the Gila National Forest or other National Forests.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nehls amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nehls amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Nehls amendment (A056) Agreed to by voice vote.
